docs.title: Best Django Admin Interface Resources
docs.text: Packages that extend the Admin interface, adding or improving features.

docs.title: Resources
docs.text:
• django-admin-sortable2 - Generic drag-and-drop ordering for objects in the Django admin interface [D 4.x]
  • Django Jazzmin - Drop-in theme for django admin, that utilises AdminLTE 3 & Bootstrap 4 to make yo' admin look jazzy [D >= 2]
  • django-admin-bootstrap - Responsive Skin for Django Admin. [D 1,11, 2.1, 2.2, 3.0]
  • django-admin-bootstrapped - A Django admin theme using Twitter Bootstrap. [D 1.8]
  • django-admin-easy - Collection of admin fields and decorators. [D 1.x, 2.x, 3.x, 4.x]
  • django-admin-interface - The ultimate admin interface, based on a modern flat theme, it lets you customize the admin title, logo and colors by the admin itself. [D 3.x, 4.x]
  • django-admin-tools - A collection of extensions/tools for the default django administration interface. [D 1.1->4.0]
  • django-admin2 - Extendable, adaptable rewrite of django.contrib.admin [D 2.2+]
  • django-flat-theme - A flat theme for Django admin interface. Modern, fresh, simple. [included in D 1.9+!]
  • django-flat-responsive - An extension for Django admin and django-flat-theme that makes interface mobile friendly. [included in D 2.0+!]
  • django-fluent-dashboard - An improved django-admin-tools dashboard for Django projects. [D 2.2+]
  • django-grappelli - A jazzy skin for the Django Admin-Interface. [D 3.2, 4.0]
  • django-hijack - Allows superusers to hijack (=login as) and work on behalf of another user. [no compatibility info, but recent updates]
  • django-jet - Modern responsive template for the admin interface with improved functionality. [no versions listed, 5 yrs old]
  • django-jet-reboot - Django Jet is modern template for Django admin interface with improved functionality. [D >= 3.0]
  • django-material Material design for Django Forms and Admin. Template driven. [D 2.2-4.0]
  • django-object-actions A Django app for adding object tools for models in the admin. [D 2.1-4.2]
  • django-suit - Modern theme for Django admin interface. [no versions listed, 4.x?]
  • django-wpadmin - WordPress look and feel for Django administration panel. [D 1.8]
  • django-xadmin - Drop-in replacement of Django admin comes with lots of goodies, fully extensible with plugin support, pretty UI based on Twitter Bootstrap. [D >=1.9, 5 yrs old]
  • yawd-admin - An administration website for Django. [D 1.5, 9 yrs old]
  • django-admin-env-notice - Visually distinguish environments in Django Admin. [D 1.9+]
  • simpleui - A modern theme based on vue+element-ui for django admin. [D 3.0]
  • django-admin-vol - Modern Bootstrap5 Design [no versions listed, freemium]
  • Django Semantic - A completely free (MIT) Semantic UI admin theme for Django [no versions listed, but recent updates]
  • djamin - A new style for Django admin. [no versions listed, 9 yrs old]
  • django-baton - A cool, modern and responsive django admin application based on bootstrap 5 [D >= 2.1]
  • djangocms-admin-style- django CMS Admin Style is a Django Theme tailored to the needs of django CMS. [D 2.2+]
  • django-admin-charts-Create beautiful configurable charts from your models and display them on the django-admin index page or on django-admin-tools dashboard. The charts are based on models and criterias defined through admin interface and some chart parameters are configurable in live view.
  • django-adminlte2-A Django AdminLTE2 theme using adminlte3
  • Black Dashboard Django-Black Dashboard - Open-source Django Template
  • Django Unfold- Modern Django admin theme for seamless interface development
  • Django Daisy- Modern & Responsive & mobile friendly Django admin theme built with daisyui (tailwindcss)
  • Django-mptt-admin- Django-mptt-admin provides a nice Django Admin interface for Mptt models
  • Django-mass-edit- Make bulk changes in the Django admin interface
  • Django Semantic Admin- ✨ Django Semantic UI admin theme
